Guide nebulization.sentence: The nurse prepares the nebulizer by assembling the device and ensuring all parts are clean.
Guide nebulization.subject: The nurse

Guide nebulization.sentence: The nurse measures the appropriate medication dosage and places it into the nebulizer cup.
Guide nebulization.subject: The nurse

Guide nebulization.sentence: The nurse connects the nebulizer to an air compressor and checks for proper functionality.
Guide nebulization.subject: The nurse
Guide nebulization.object: the nebulizer to an air compressor

Guide nebulization.sentence: The nurse positions the patient comfortably and instructs them on how to use the mouthpiece or face mask.
Guide nebulization.subject: The nurse

Guide nebulization.sentence: The nurse monitors the patient during nebulization to assess effectiveness and manage any discomfort.
Guide nebulization.subject: The nurse
